name: Bouncy Deer
description:
Launch your deer and use different elements such as trampolines and cannons to get the deer into the goal.

Controls:

Mouse Only

Credits:

Game logic & Programming: Milan Varady

Art: Gabor Marton

Level Design: Gabor Marton, Milan Varady

Music: Context Sensitive

This project is open source, have a look at it here: https://github.com/MilanVarady/Bouncy-Deer
